Uses of Class
kaleidoscope.Shape

    • Uses of Shape in kaleidoscope

      Subclasses of Shape in kaleidoscope 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Ball
      Ball extends Shape.
      class  Polygon
      Polygon extends Shape and adds methods and instance variables that make it compatible with the drawing methods drawPolygon and fillPolygon.
      class  Rectangle
      Rectangle extends Shape.
      Methods in kaleidoscope that return Shape 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Shape[] Model.getShapes()
